content.text: Match ends, Almería 0, Barcelona 8.

Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Diego Alves.
Attempt saved. David Villa (Barcelona) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Bojan with a through ball.

Offside, Almería. Henok Goitom tries a through ball, but Pablo Piatti is caught offside.
